screen_desc: The screenshot displays a smartphone home screen with a minimalistic design. It features a pink background and includes essential app icons such as Email, Google Photos, YouTube, Phone, Messages, Google Chrome, and the Google Play Store. The bottom of the screen has the Google search bar and a notification icon.
action_think: The user needs to install and open HBO Max app and enter their user name and password. First, I need to locate the app store that will allow me to install HBO Max.
action_plan: Install HBO Max from the store
action_desc: click on the Google Play Store icon
action_result: Scrolling up on the home screen has led to the opening of the app drawer, where more apps are visible. This action has moved us closer to finding the HBO Max app, which is necessary to fulfill the user's request. However, we still need to locate the HBO Max app within the drawer to proceed with the installation.
